net.danielmor.engine
Class GameScreen

java.lang.Object
  net.danielmor.engine.GameScreen
Direct Known Subclasses:
MainGameScreen
public abstract class GameScreen
extends Object

Creates image buffer capable of storing data and switching between different screens

Constructor Detail

GameScreen

public GameScreen(GameWindow window,
                  Game game)
Stores which GameWindow this screen will be in, and creates screen's image buffer with window's width and height. Also adds to 'numberOfScreens' to keep track of total screens deployed
